snippet: Senator Charles E. Schumer is not only an envoy to the White House but also the Democratic majority’s most important bipartisan bridge builder.
abstract: Sen Charles E Schumer of New York is not only envoy to White House but also Democratic majority’s most important bipartisan bridge builder; his political fortunes are tied to outcome of major public policy fights on gun control and immigration; colleagues believe his ultimate goal is to attain post of Senate majority leader after Sen Harry Reid steps down.
lead_paragraph: Senator Charles E. Schumer is not only an envoy to the White House but also the Democratic majority’s most important bipartisan bridge builder.

headline.seo: Schumer Reaches Across the Aisle as a Bipartisan Bridge Builder
headline.main: Schumer’s New Brief: Turning Foes Into Friends
headline.print_headline: Schumer’s New Brief: Turning Foes Into Friends
